Recommendations: 1. It is suggested that an improved system be established to make the conduct of extension projects sustainable.

2. Establish a clear, comprehensive, but workable extension project aligned to the program wherein the participation of stakeholders is visible, applying the principle of convergence with govemment and non-government agencies for project sustainability and impact analyses.
3. If possible, scoping process may be incorporated prior to the implementation of extension projects.
4. Outreach activities be integrated to ensure continuity and sustainability and for it to be considered as extension program.
5. MOA/Terminal reports should be updated and made available upon completion of the project.
